description: Set the depth of field values for the player's view model when at hip. If start >= end, depth of field is disabled.
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: start
description: Before this distance, depth of field is maximally blurry.

params.name: end
description: After this distance, depth of field is perfectly in focus.
